name: Botifist
description:
In the aftermath of a robotic take over a Pacifist finds himself stranded in a sea of robots trying to escape with his life. The player is a human soul trapped inside of a robot and is trying to get to his body.

In this fighting game the object is to survive by killing off the other robots. But how does a pacifist survive without hurting anyone? Well by having them hurt themselves of course!
